Introduction
This topic contains information on determining when UMEs are deductible, including
authority under which UMEs are deductible
determining deductible expenses
impact of deductible medical expenses on a Section 306 Pension rate
, and
medical expense deduction allowed before expenses are incurred
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Reduction of Income Due to Unreimbursed Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
